duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive the vision, process design, and implementation of standardized driver-based financial planning processes & models to improve the accuracy and insights of Autodesk’s financial plans.
Partner with GTM finance teams to understand business planning and reporting needs, reimagine planning and performance management process, data and dashboards.
Work with corporate teams to prioritize data projects, build out reporting solutions, and provide guidance to CIO organization of data needs of COO finance.
Co-create an agile and scalable EPM solution by redesigning processes for simplicity, agility, and adaptability to keep up with GTM innovation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or higher in data/analytics, Finance, industrial engineering, accounting or related field
